artist: Maker: Charles Aldridge; Maker: Henry Green
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: George III silver Inkstand, oblong, with four paw feet; three square bottles holders, pierced, with three glass bottles each with silver lid, pierced; quill feather pen, and pen point (white); one white taper
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of stand.  Each bottle frame stamped with maker\'s mark and lion passant.  Bottle fittings unmarked.
title: Inkstand
